ContactTargetInfo.description: The contact that SSM Incident Manager is engaging during an incident.

properties.name: ContactId
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the contact.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the contact.

properties.name: IsEssential
properties.description: A Boolean value determining if the contact's acknowledgement stops the progress of stages in the plan.

type.description: A Boolean value determining if the contact's acknowledgement stops the progress of stages in the plan.

ChannelTargetInfo.description: Information about the contact channel that SSM Incident Manager uses to engage the contact.

properties.name: ChannelId
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the contact channel.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the contact channel.

properties.name: RetryIntervalInMinutes
properties.description: The number of minutes to wait to retry sending engagement in the case the engagement initially fails.

type.description: The number of minutes to wait to retry sending engagement in the case the engagement initially fails.

Stage.description: A set amount of time that an escalation plan or engagement plan engages the specified contacts or contact methods.

properties.name: DurationInMinutes
properties.description: The time to wait until beginning the next stage.

type.description: The time to wait until beginning the next stage.

properties.name: Targets
properties.description: The contacts or contact methods that the escalation plan or engagement plan is engaging.

type.description: The contacts or contact methods that the escalation plan or engagement plan is engaging.

properties.name: RotationIds
properties.description: List of Rotation Ids to associate with Contact

type.description: List of Rotation Ids to associate with Contact

Targets.description: The contacts or contact methods that the escalation plan or engagement plan is engaging.

properties.name: Alias
properties.description: Alias of the contact. String value with 20 to 256 characters. Only alphabetical, numeric characters, dash, or underscore allowed.

type.description: Alias of the contact. String value with 20 to 256 characters. Only alphabetical, numeric characters, dash, or underscore allowed.

properties.name: DisplayName
properties.description: Name of the contact. String value with 3 to 256 characters. Only alphabetical, space, numeric characters, dash, or underscore allowed.

type.description: Name of the contact. String value with 3 to 256 characters. Only alphabetical, space, numeric characters, dash, or underscore allowed.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: Contact type, which specify type of contact. Currently supported values: “PERSONAL”, “SHARED”, “OTHER“.

type.description: Contact type, which specify type of contact. Currently supported values: “PERSONAL”, “SHARED”, “OTHER“.

properties.name: Plan
properties.description: The stages that an escalation plan or engagement plan engages contacts and contact methods in.

type.description: The stages that an escalation plan or engagement plan engages contacts and contact methods in.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the contact.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the contact.
